page.title: 14 Christmas memories (cont)
page.content: Nanny and Grandad brought some presents too.We had a real Christmas Tree with Christmas lights and chocolate things and Christmas crackers on it.I got a thimble and a hat(paper) out of my cracker,and a funny joke. For breakfast we had egg,sausage and fried bread and tomatoes and fried potatoes which mummy cooked. When Nanny and Grandad came we opened their presents.They brought me a racing car with a trailer and the racing car goon the trailer.We bought Grandad a tie I've forgotten what we bought Granny. We had roast turkey for lunch with vegetables and Christmas pudding with custard for lunch.Nanny and Grandad stayed the night and went home on Boxing Day after lunch.
